vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.21.16;
father of: Goliath (H1555), Ishbi-benob (H3430), Saph (H5593), Lahmi (H3902), huge_man (H4060A); also translated "giant";
Also named: re.pha.im (רְפָאִים "Raphaite" H7497H)
§ giant, Rephah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) רָפָאִים   ancestro de una tribu de gigantes; (b) רָפָיָה   hijo de Biná; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 巨人, 利乏音
1a) 古時巨人支派

1) giants, Rephaim
1a) old tribe of giants
2) People descended from Repha(?), first mentioned at Gen.14.5
Also named: zam.zom (זַמְזֻמִּים "Zamzummin" H2157)
§ 1) giants, Rephaim
1a) old tribe of giants
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   espíritus de la muerte; (2) זַמְזֻמִּים   descendientes de Rafá; tribu de gigantes
